name: Data Collection Methods
description: Techniques for gathering raw intelligence from multiple sources.

cards.title: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Techniques
cards.description: Gathering intelligence from publicly available sources.
bulletpoints: Use advanced search operators for deep web intelligence gathering
Monitor social media for emerging threat indicators
Validate sources and detect misinformation or disinformation

cards.title: Human Intelligence (HUMINT) Collection
cards.description: Using interpersonal sources to acquire intelligence.
bulletpoints: Use psychological techniques to elicit information covertly
Assess the credibility and reliability of human sources
